column1: Little Goat Diner////I came here once about a year ago and wasn't totally in love
column2: so when a friend suggested coming here
column3: I jumped at the chance to try it again. All of the goat restaurants are so popular! It had to be just me
column6: I think I ordered the same thing both times: Los Drowned. There were too many pickled veggies on top
column7: and it was just plain hard to eat. My friend and I shared the chili cheese fries
column8: and these were weird too. The chili had almost Indian-like spices in addition to a heck of a lot of salt. Five fries in
